remarks: If two translations have different traces, the trace of their composition is also different.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2013.)
statement:
trlcone.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlcone.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcone.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcone.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcone $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) /\ G =/= ( _I |` B ) ) ) -> ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` ( F o. G ) ) ) $.
